## normalize() function

Normalize strings, removes accent

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function normalize(str: string, charMap: Object): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  str | string | String to be normalized |
|  charMap | Object | CharMap used for normalization |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
